outline:
1. measure, measurement, stature, size, garment
    1. measure, act of measurement
    2. measurement, size
    3. measured portion, extent
    4. garment
  2. (BDB) tribute
kjv_def: garment, measure(-ing, meteyard, piece, size, (great) stature, tribute, wide.
strongs_def: properly, extension, i.e. height or breadth; also a measure (including its standard); hence a portion (as measured) or a vestment; specifically, tribute (as measured)
